verses.verse: A good <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H4480>ointment;<s%> <S%H8081><s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> than the <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of one's <S%H3205>birth.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning,<s%> than to <S%H4480>go<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is the <S%H5490>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men;<s%> and the <S%H2416>living<s%> will <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

Sorrow <S%H3708><s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H4480>laughter:<s%> <S%H7814><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> by the <S%H7455>sadness<s%> of the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> is made <S%H3190>better.<s%>

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning;<s%> but the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8057>mirth.<s%>

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> than for a <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H7892>song<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> as the <S%H6963>crackling<s%> of <S%H5518>thorns<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> a <S%H5518>pot,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> is the <S%H7814>laughter<s%> of the <S%H3684>fool:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
Surely <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6233>oppression<s%> maketh a wise <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H1984>mad;<s%> and a <S%H4979>gift<s%> <S%H6>destroyeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is the <S%H319>end<s%> of a <S%H1697>thing<s%> than the <S%H4480>beginning<s%> <S%H7225><s%> thereof: and the <S%H750>patient<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H4480>proud<s%> <S%H1362><s%> in <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H926>hasty<s%> in thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to be <S%H3707>angry:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3708>anger<s%> <S%H5117>resteth<s%> in the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> the cause that the former <S%H7945>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7223><s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H4480>these?<s%> <S%H428><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou dost <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7592>inquire<s%> <S%H4480>wisely<s%> <S%H2451><s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%>
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> and by it there is <S%H3148>profit<s%> to them that <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H6738>defense,<s%> and <S%H3701>money<s%> is a <S%H6738>defense:<s%> but the <S%H3504>excellency<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is, that <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> giveth <S%H2421>life<s%> to them that <S%H1167>have<s%> it.

Consider <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> make that <S%H8626>straight,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath made <S%H5791>crooked?<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2896>joyful,<s%> but in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>adversity<s%> <S%H7200>consider:<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> hath <S%H6213>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2088>one<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H2088>other,<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H1700>end<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H7945>nothing<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3972><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

<S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> things have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H1892>vanity:<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H6662>just<s%> man that <S%H6>perisheth<s%> in his <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man that <S%H748>prolongeth<s%> his life in his <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%>

Be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> over <S%H7235>much;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> make thyself over <S%H2449>wise:<s%> <S%H3148><s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> shouldest thou destroy <S%H8074>thyself?<s%>

Be <S%H408>not<s%> over <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7561>wicked,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> thou <S%H5530>foolish:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> shouldest thou <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3808>before<s%> thy <S%H6256>time?<s%>

It is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou shouldest take <S%H270>hold<s%> of <S%H2088>this;<s%> yea, <S%H1571>also<s%> from <S%H4480>this<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H5117>withdraw<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> <S%H5810>strengtheneth<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> more than <S%H4480>ten<s%> <S%H6235><s%> <S%H7989>mighty<s%> men <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> upon <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H5414>take<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3820>heed<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> <S%H834>lest<s%> <S%H3808><s%> thou <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> thee:

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7227>oftentimes<s%> <S%H6471><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> thine own <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H859>thyself<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%> hast <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H312>others.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2090>this<s%> have I <S%H5254>proved<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will be <S%H2449>wise;<s%> but <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.
That which <S%H4100>is<s%> <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> far <S%H7350>off,<s%> and exceeding <S%H6013>deep,<s%> <S%H6013><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can find it <S%H4672>out?<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> <S%H5437>applied<s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know,<s%> and to <S%H8446>search,<s%> and to seek <S%H1245>out<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and the <S%H2808>reason<s%> of things, and to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> of <S%H3689>folly,<s%> even of <S%H5531>foolishness<s%> and madness: <S%H1947><s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> more <S%H4751>bitter<s%> than <S%H4480>death<s%> <S%H4194><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1931><s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H4685>snares<s%> and <S%H2764>nets,<s%> and her <S%H3027>hands<s%> as <S%H612>bands:<s%> whoso <S%H2896>pleaseth<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H4422>escape<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> her; but the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> by her.

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> have I <S%H4672>found,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H6953>preacher,<s%> counting <S%H259>one<s%> by <S%H259>one,<s%> to find <S%H4672>out<s%> the account: <S%H2808><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh,<s%> but I <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among a <S%H4480>thousand<s%> <S%H505><s%> have I <S%H4672>found;<s%> but a <S%H802>woman<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> have I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>found.<s%>

Lo, <S%H7200><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> have I <S%H4672>found,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3477>upright;<s%> but <S%H1992>they<s%> have sought <S%H1245>out<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2810>inventions.<s%>
